DESCRIPTION: The next time a creature with #yRuin takes unblocked attack damage, they lose HP equal to their #yRuin for each buff and debuff they have.
Orb: When evoked, applies #yRuin to the enemy with the most HP. Increases #yRuin applied whenever you discard a card.
Gain an Orb slot then channel the listed Orb.
When played, activate the passive of your next Orb, then of all #yFull and #yCrescent #yMoon Orbs.
At the end of your turn, if this is in your hand, shuffle it into your draw pile and put an infestation counter on it.
